target.mrk: À propos de la réplication de serveur

trans-unit.source: Server replication is a process which enables to secure both backed up data blocks and meta-data by replicating a <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server to another one.

seg-source.mrk: Server replication is a process which enables to secure both backed up data blocks and meta-data by replicating a <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> server to another one.

target.mrk: La réplication de serveur est un processus qui permet de sécuriser à la fois les blocs de données sauvegardés et les métadonnées en répliquant un serveur <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"><MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" /></MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> sur un autre.

trans-unit.source: If Server A fails, the backups of its agents are not redirected to Server B. However, as the replication of Server A to Server B has secured Server A blocks and meta-data, you can rebuild Server A from Server B. You can also restore the agents directly from Server B using the advanced restore function.

seg-source.mrk: If Server A fails, the backups of its agents are not redirected to Server B. However, as the replication of Server A to Server B has secured Server A blocks and meta-data, you can rebuild Server A from Server B. You can also restore the agents directly from Server B using the advanced restore function.

target.mrk: Si le serveur A est défaillant, les sauvegardes de ses agents ne sont pas redirigées vers le serveur B. Cependant, comme la réplication du serveur A vers le serveur B a sécurisé les blocs et les métadonnées du serveur A, vous pouvez reconstruire le serveur A à partir du serveur B. Vous pouvez également restaurer les agents directement à partir du serveur B, en utilisant la fonction de restauration avancée.
